description: Fallback product catalog for circuit breaker scenarios

products.name: Personal Brand Starter Kit
products.description: Complete starter package for building your personal brand from scratch. Includes brand strategy session, visual identity guidelines, and LinkedIn optimization.

products.name: Personal Brand Accelerator
products.description: Intensive 4-week program to fast-track your personal brand development. Includes weekly coaching, content calendar, and engagement strategy.

products.name: Executive Presence Package
products.description: Premium package for senior leaders looking to establish thought leadership. Includes media training, keynote development, and PR strategy.

products.name: Content Creator Launchpad
products.description: Everything you need to start your content creation journey. Video production basics, content strategy, and platform optimization.

products.name: Professional Headshot Session
products.description: Professional photography session with retouching. Includes 3 final edited images optimized for LinkedIn and professional use.

products.name: Personal Styling Consultation
products.description: One-on-one styling session to develop your professional wardrobe. Includes color analysis and shopping recommendations.

products.name: Personal Brand Coaching (4 sessions)
products.description: Four 60-minute coaching sessions to develop and refine your personal brand strategy.

products.name: LinkedIn Profile Optimization
products.description: Complete LinkedIn profile overhaul including headline, summary, experience sections, and keyword optimization.

products.name: Personal Brand Playbook Template
products.description: Comprehensive Notion template with frameworks for defining your brand, content planning, and networking strategy.

products.name: LinkedIn Mastery Course
products.description: Self-paced online course covering advanced LinkedIn strategies, content creation, and network building.

products.name: Brand Builder Starter (Monthly)
products.description: Monthly subscription with access to templates, monthly group coaching, and community forum.

products.name: Brand Builder Pro (Monthly)
products.description: Professional tier with weekly office hours, 1-on-1 monthly coaching, and premium content library.
